news.title: AI invents new antibiotics that could kill superbugs gonorrhoea and MRSA
news.summary: Two new potential drugs have been designed by an artificial intelligence model to kill drug-resistant bacteria, researchers have revealed.

news.summary: Top A-level results have risen again. Here's what you need to know.

news.title: What do Putin and Trump each want from the Alaska summit?
news.summary: The Russian leader senses a chance for more international recognition, while his American counterpart hopes to play peacemaker.

news.title: Teenager's death after hospital failings is ruled unlawful
news.summary: An inquest jury finds 14-year-old Ruth Szymankiewicz was unlawfully killed.

news.title: King says VJ Day heroes will 'never be forgotten'
news.summary: A service of remembrance on Friday will mark the 80th anniversary of Victory over Japan Day.

news.title: Second MasterChef contestant edited out of scandal-hit series
news.summary: The show's production company says another chef decided not to be included "given recent events".

news.summary: Depending on the timeframe you look at, the GDP figures can be seen as glass half full or half empty.

news.title: Cost of weight-loss drug Mounjaro could rise significantly
news.summary: The recommended UK price will rise by up to 170%, although the impact on consumers could be more limited.

news.title: Man accused of driving car into Liverpool FC parade crowd faces 24 new charges
news.summary: Paul Doyle became tearful as he was asked to confirm his identity at Liverpool Crown Court.

news.title: Israeli settlement plans will 'bury' idea of Palestinian state, minister says
news.summary: Far-right Israeli minister Bezalel Smotrich announced approval for 3,401 new homes in the controversial E1 area project in the occupied West Bank.
